title: Exchange Web Services (com.apple.ews.account)
description: The payload that configures an Exchange Web Services accounts.

UserName.title: Account user name
UserName.description: The user name for this Exchange account. Required for noninteractive installation, such as through MDM. If missing, the system prompts the user for it during interactive profile installation.

EmailAddress.title: Account email address
EmailAddress.description: The full email address for the account. If the email address string isn't present in the payload, the device prompts for it during profile installation.

Password.title: Account password
Password.description: The password of the account. Use only with encrypted profiles.

IdentificationUUID.title: IdentificationUUID
IdentificationUUID.description: The UUID of the Identification Payload to use as the source for user values.

Host.title: Internal Exchange Host
Host.description: The Exchange server host name or IP address. Ignored if using OAuth.

SSL.title: Use SSL for Internal Exchange Host

ExternalSSL.title: Use SSL for External Exchange Host
ExternalSSL.description: If 'true', the system enables SSL for connections to the external server.

OAuth.title: Use OAuth
OAuth.description: If 'true', the system enables OAuth for authentication. Don't specify a password if 'OAuth' is 'true'. Available in macOS 10.14 and later

OAuthSignInURL.title: URL for OAuth sign-in
OAuthSignInURL.description: The URL to load into a web view for authentication through OAuth when autodiscovery isn't used. This setting requires a 'Host' value.

PayloadCertificateUUID.title: Payload Certificate UUID
PayloadCertificateUUID.description: The UUID of the certificate payload within the same profile to use for the identity credential. Supported on macOS 10.12 or later.

AuthenticationCertificateUUID.description: The UUID of the certificate payload within the same profile to use for the identity credential. Supported on macOS 10.11 or later. On macOS 10.12 or later use the PayloadCertificateUUID.

allowMailDrop.title: Allow Mail Drop
allowMailDrop.description: If 'true', the system enables Mail Drop.
